feat: Implement WASPAS calculation with jabatan target and auto-fill penilaian

- Add auto-fill for criteria K1 (Pangkat), K2 (Masa Jabatan), K3 (Pendidikan), K8 (Bidang Ilmu)
- Add MasaJabatanRange and PersentaseConversion models for value conversion
- Add PenilaianAutoFillService for calculating auto-fill values
- Update WaspasProses to calculate based on selected jabatan target
- Save WASPAS results to database with jabatan_target_id
- Update WaspasHasil to filter results by jabatan target
- Add validation for required fields in Penilaian
- Improve UI: wider content area, larger dropdowns, centered buttons
- Display category labels for auto-filled criteria
- Fix model relationships (JabatanTarget, SyaratJabatan, WaspasNilai)
